Name: Shadow of the Past - devote to Hills
Description2:
Travelers of the Tide:
"Within the folds of this letter lies a gift, a veil against the scent of the world beyond.

Draped in its embrace, you become one with nature.

Only then may you step into the village, what you seek lies in our hallowed grounds.

But tread lightlyâ€”night has fallen, and the weight of dew clings to the earth, each step a whisper in the dark."
